constraint.name: ca_comisiones_agentes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codagente) REFERENCES agentes (codagente) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_comisiones_clientes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codcliente) REFERENCES clientes (codcliente) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_comisiones_empresas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idempresa) REFERENCES empresas (idempresa) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_comisiones_familias
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codfamilia) REFERENCES familias (codfamilia) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_comisiones_productos
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idproducto) REFERENCES productos (idproducto) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
